name: spliit
tagline: A group expense and bill splitting tool
description: Spliit is a self-hosted bill splitting and expense sharing app for groups. It helps track balances, settlements, and shared purchases through a tidy web UI.

features.title: Expense Splitting
features.description: Divides bills and expenses among group members

features.title: Group Management
features.description: Creates groups for trips, roommates, or shared expenses

features.title: Balance Tracking
features.description: Calculates who owes whom and by how much

features.title: Settlement Suggestions
features.description: Recommends optimal payment plan to settle all debts

features.title: Multiple Currencies
features.description: Handles expenses in different currencies with conversion

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Attaches receipt photos to expense entries

features.title: Expense Categories
features.description: Organizes spending by category for better tracking

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Divides expenses by custom percentages or amounts
